ComicInfo.Summary:
The cat's outta the bag... and out for blood! Eddie and Tala are on the verge of escaping Baltimore once and for all, but Simon, the feline hitman, stands in their way. Will our heroes be able to defeat Simon, steal back their car, and skip town in one piece? Or will Eddie do something stupid and get everyone killed? Find out inside, Grumble fans! And for the hardcore collectors out there, Albatross offers a special limited edition card stock cover of Grumble #3 with art by Farel Dalrymple!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike Norton & Marissa Louise | 1 | B | Limited Edition Cover B | Farel Dalrymple | Missing |
